Får detta plats på en DVD-skiva? 

Det tar ju 4.5GB och det finns bara 4.7GB på en DVD-skiva.
Spatzy ja det får plats om du gör om dvd9 ison till dvd5 format med dvd5 fix

Ok, here it is. You download the file and extract the RAR files into one ISO file. The go to:
http://www.xbox-scene.com/tools/tools.php?page=isotools

and download XBOX ISO and install the program, its all free. 
Then take the ISO file you just made from all the RAR files and use the extract XISO option *This will take quite some time to extract everything. It will make a seperate folder that is about the same size as the origional ISO file but it contains all of the origional info from the xbox game. Go into this folder and click on default then sounds and delete the French, German, Spanish and Italian dub over / subtitle folders (Four folders in all) *make sure to leave the int folder now you can close the folder. Then go back to the XISO and use the Create XISO option and select the main folder that was created using the extraction tool. Since you removed the folders that were listed earlier, when the new XISO file is complete is should be a little under 4GB and can fit perfectly on a normal DVD/R. I hope this helps the people that are a bit lost, since no one else could seem to answer my question. PIRATE BAY RULES!!!!

hi, How would I burn this to a DVD it is bigger then 4.gb. Please help.
Thanks

Extract the iso on ur comp, using Qwix, then delete the "Videos" folder. U don't need that one. The game is still a bit too big, so delete some of the tutorial video files in the "VideosPal" folder. For example one of the equipment videos. Now the size should be ok. Now simply make a new iso using Qwix, and burn it.
